text_input: Umagto ako sa baeay sang igkampod.
output: I went to my cousin's house.

text_input: Mataeom ro siyaw.
output: The knife is sharp.

text_input: Maeapad ro eugta ni Mang Kanor.
output: Mang Kanor's lot is wide.

text_input: Nagdamgo ako kabii.
output: I dreamed last night.

text_input: Bilog ro buean.
output: The moon is round.

text_input: Gin-eapog ni Josh ro bola.
output: Josh threw the ball.

text_input: Nagbakae si Maya sa baraka.
output: Maya bought from the store.

text_input: Nagbalintong si Dan sa hagdan.
output: Dan fell down the stairs.

text_input: Mahumot ro bueak.
output: The flowers smell nice.

text_input: Nag-ihapon ako sa baeay sang klasmeyt.
output: I ate dinner at my classmate's house.

text_input: Makaron eang owa nag-ilabas si Jonathan.
output: Only today did Jonathan not eat lunch.

text_input: Mabueak ro eambong nga suksok ni Maria.
output: The clothes that Maria is wearing are flowery.

text_input: Gin-eapog ni Asi ro sudlay sa idaeom it duyan.
output: Asi threw the comb under the craddle.

text_input: Maaeam magsueat it mga istorya nga makataeangis ro akong kaklase.
output: My classmate is smart when it comes to writing stories that make people cry.

text_input: Maeapad ro gaob nga nabu-oe nana sa pagbalintong sa hagdanan.
output: He got a wide bruise when he fell from the stairs.

text_input: Ginbu-oe ni Sean ro baeonan ni Mark.
output: Sean took Mark's lunch-box.

text_input: Napuno it baeas ro anang banig dahil kakaeangoy na eang sa baybay.
output: His mat became full of sand because he just went swimming at the beach.

text_input: Ginhueat ni Aaron si Drey nga maghueag agod magdungan sanda.
output: Aaron waited for Drey so that they could move in unison.

text_input: Maeapad ro binakae nga haboe ni Ronnie para sa anang katre.
output: The blanket that Ronnie bought for his bed was wide.

text_input: Ginbugkos nana ro mga eansang ag gintago sa anang buesa.
output: He tied the nails together and hid them in his pocket.

text_input: Si Bella hay gwapa nga bayi.
output: Bella is a beautiful girl.

text_input: Idto sa bueutangan ro tinapay.
output: The bread is in the container.

text_input: Madasig magdaeagan ro ayam.
output: The dog runs fast.

text_input: Mahilig sa tanom si Janette.
output: Janette loves plants.

text_input: Indi makita ni Jessica ro euwag.
output: Jessica cannot find the ladle.

text_input: Gakita kami hinaga ni Dan sa plaza.
output: Dan and I will meet at the plaza tomorrow.

text_input: Pirmi nga naulihi si Kyle sa klase.
output: Kyle is always late in class.

text_input: Naubos eagi ro kwarta nga ginapadaea ni nanay.
output: The money that mother sent was already used up.

text_input: Nagpaayos ako it ngipon kahapon.
output: I had my teeth fixed yesterday.

text_input: Ginregaluhan ako ni Nick it pahumot.
output: Nick gifted me a perfume.

text_input: Si Antonio ag Maria ro pangaean it akong ginikanan.
output: Antonio and Maria are the names of my parents.

text_input: Ginhakwat ni James ro sangka sako nga bugas gamit ra abaga.
output: James used his shoulders to lift a sack of rice.

text_input: Abante it daywa nga puntos ro grupo nanday Edward.
output: Edward’s team is leading with 2 points.

text_input: Mas mabahoe ro alima ni Jane kaysa kay Kaila.
output: Jane’s hand is bigger than Kaila’s.

text_input: Ako hay may napueo nga tudlo sa akong daywang alima.
output: I have 10 fingers on both of my hands.

text_input: Adlaw-adlaw ginabunyagan ni lola Rosa ro ana nga mga tanom.
output: Lola Rosa waters her plants everyday.

text_input: Manami ro among ilabas kaina.
output: Our lunch was very delicious.

text_input: Sinampae ni Elsa si Anna dahil imaw hay gapina-ugtas.
output: Elsa slapped Anna because she is naughty.

text_input: Maeapad ro baeay ni Pedro.
output: Pedro’s house is wide.

text_input: Nagbakae it mantika si Juan sa tindahan.
output: Juan bought oil from the market.

text_input: May an-um nga unga si Lolo Roberto.
output: Lolo Roberto has six children.

text_input: Ginkaeos it kuring ro akong uyahon.
output: A cat scratched my face.

text_input: Kanami pamantawon ro mga pispis sa sanga it puno.
output: The birds on the tree branch are nice to look at.

text_input: Nagpanglimpyo si Alex sa likod it anda nga baeay gamit ro silhig.
output: Alex cleaned their backyard using a broom.

text_input: Ginhutik ni Richandrey kay Kaila ro ana nga nailaan.
output: Richandrey whispered his crush’s name to Kaila.

text_input: Manami ro ginabaligya nga panit it manok sa plaza.
output: The chicken skin being sold at the plaza is delicious.

text_input: Ginbuksan ni Amara ro purtahan.
output: Amara opened the door.

text_input: Makahaeawa ro hibayag ni Kate.
output: Kate’s laugh is contagious.

text_input: Haaywanan ni Mikay ro anang kaeo.
output: Mikay left her hat.

text_input: Abo kung kumaon it humay si Bobby.
output: Bobby eats a lot of rice.
